wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Ian Murray Ward  (29 June 1907 – 6 April 1986) was a Scottish freestyle sport wrestler who competed for Great Britain in the 1936 Summer Olympics. In 1936 he competed in the freestyle light heavyweight tournament. At the 1938 Empire Games he won the bronze medal in the freestyle light heavyweight class.
